content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "write_to_file" command to add detailed information about the best time to kayak in Norway to my "norway_kayaking.txt" file. The information includes the recommended summer months and my plan to research transportation, lodging, and equipment rental options and create a detailed itinerary for my trip. The command successfully wrote
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.expedia.com/Destinations-In-Norway.d138.Flight-Destinations", "https://www.skyscanner.com/flights-to/no/cheap-flights-to-norway.html", "https://www.kayak.com/flight-routes/United-States-US0/Norway-NO0", "https://www.norwegian.com/us/booking/booking-information/ticket-types/", "https://www.traveloffpath.com/new-direct-flights-from-the-u-s-to-norway-launching-this-summer/", "https://www.united.com/en-us/flights-to-norway", "https://www.momondo.com/flights/norway", "https://www.lifeinnorway.net/fly-to-norway/"]', type='action_result')]
